arts.ttl: AS Roma XI vs Sassuolo – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: AS Roma will look to regain their rhythm when the capital club travel to face newly-promoted Sassuolo in Serie A. The Giallorossi are eager to come back to winning ways after a mixed run of results, but their forward line remains a key concern for Gian Piero Gasperini.
